cosmos.question: I am big and yellow and shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I help plants grow!
🔥 I am very hot!
😎 You can't look right at me!

cosmos.question: I am round and sometimes you can see me at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Wolves howl at me!
🧀 Some people say I'm made of cheese!
🌑 I change shape in the sky!

cosmos.question: I twinkle and shine so bright, high up in the dark night! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I’m very far away
🌌 I'm a glowing ball of gas
🌠 You can make a wish on me

cosmos.question: I am big and blue and green and you live on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I am your home!
🌱 Plants and animals live here.
💧I have lots of water.

cosmos.question: I'm a hot ball of fire, much smaller than the Sun. You see many of me at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 I twinkle in the dark.
🔥 I am a giant ball of hot gas.
🌃 I’m found way up high in the sky.

cosmos.question: It's a cold icy rock with a tail. What could it be?

hints.text: ❄️ It comes from very far away!
☄️ Sometimes it is called a shooting star, but it isn't!
💨 It leaves a streak when it flies.

cosmos.question: I’m big and red and named after a Roman god. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I’m also the name of a candy bar!
🤖 Robots have explored me!
🏜️ I am known as the Red Planet

cosmos.question: I am a big, stormy planet with a giant red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I'm the biggest planet in our solar system.
💨 I am made mostly of gas.
🔴 My spot is a very big storm!

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
💨 I am a gas giant.
🔭 You can see my rings with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many, many stars. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am very, very big!
✨ I can be spiral-shaped or elliptical.
🌌 Our solar system is part of the Milky Way.

food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys eat me!
💛 I'm the color of the sun.
👋 You peel me before you eat me.

food.question: I am round and red, sometimes green! I grow on trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White loved me!
🌳 I grow on a tree.
🔴 I can be red or green.

food.question: I am crunchy and orange! Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me!
🟠 I am the color of pumpkins.
✨ I am good for your eyes.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from an animal!
🥛 Babies drink me from a bottle.
⚪ I am the color of snow.

food.question: I am long and brown on the outside and white/yellow on the inside. You can make fries out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make a yummy side with me.
🥔 I grow under the ground.
🤎 I am brown on the outside, and yellow on the inside.

food.question: I'm a small, green ball. I grow in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am a vegetable.
🟢 I am the color of grass.
🌱 I am small and round

food.question: I am a sweet treat. I can be chocolate or vanilla flavored. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I'm cold!
🍫 I can be many different flavors.
😋 I am a dessert that makes you happy!

food.question: I'm a yellow fruit that's sour. You can make lemonade with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍋 My juice is very tart!
🟡 I am the color of sunshine.
🍹 You can make a refreshing drink with me.

food.question: I am soft and white or brown. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am made from flour.
🥪 You can put yummy things between me.
🌾 I come from wheat.

food.question: I have a shell and a yellow inside. You can scramble me or fry me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐔 I come from a hen.
🍳 You can cook me in many ways!
🥚 I am a breakfast food.
